meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lustrous.
meanings.sent1: Her dress sparkled with lustrousness under the lights.
meanings.sent2: The lustrousness of the polished silver caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat had an unexpected lustrousness that mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent4: The lustrousness of her smile lit up the room like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The lustrousness of the gemstone was so intense, it seemed to glow from within.

meanings.definition: The shine or brightness of a surface.
meanings.sent1: The lustrousness of the waxed floor made it look like a mirror.
meanings.sent2: The lustrousness of the car's paint job was truly impressive.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret sauce added a delightful lustrousness to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The lustrousness of the moon on the water created a magical reflection.
meanings.sent5: The lustrousness of the diamond was so brilliant, it seemed to light up the room.
